lead_paragraph: With Tiger Woods hitting golf balls at a juniors clinic in South Carolina earlier this week, media speculation has been mounting that the former world number one could make his PGA Tour return within the next month.

headline.print_headline: Speculation Mounts Over Tiger's Possible PGA Tour Return
headline.main: Speculation Mounts Over Tiger's Possible PGA Tour Return
